contactText: These details will be displayed in your store on the “Contact Us” page so your customers can contact you
faqsErr: The question must contain between 5 and 120 characters
deletefaq: Are you sure you want to delete this FAQ?
faqtext: Add FAQs to answer your customers' most frequently asked questions. They will be displayed on your store's FAQ page.
logotext: Upload your logo and introduce your store.
logoabout: It is best if the logo is in PNG format with a transparent background for better visibility and is square in shape, for example 250x250 pixels.
themtext: Control the look and feel of your store.
Title: Title
ChooseProductLook: Choose how the product will look in your store.
ChooseCategoryLook: Choose how the category will look in your store.
ConfigureNavbar: Configure and design the navigation bar.
CreateThankYouPage: Create and design a thank you page
